# Get All Leads

# Description

Uses the Query - GET API to
                retrieve all leads from Marketo.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

* 
* Lead IDs - A comma-separated list of lead IDs. This field can be used and is required only when Email addresses is empty. This field supports String type input.
* Email addresses - A comma-separated list of lead emails. This field can be used and is required only when Lead IDs field is empty. This field supports String type input.









* Leads - Automatically generated output variable.
